TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed ContextMenuService extends System.Object
public ref class ContextMenuService abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供系統實作以顯示 。

span.span: Provides the system implementation for displaying a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供可用來指定的外觀和內容功能表位置的附加的屬性。The class provides attached properties that can be used to specify the appearance and position of a context menu. 中的屬性的許多類別也會定義由。Many of the properties in the class are also defined by the . 有時候會藉由設定屬性更方便上設定屬性類別比。Sometimes it is more convenient to set the properties by using the class than by setting the properties on a . 例如，您可以建立共用的多個項目，但會使用類別，以指定不同位置每個項目。For example, you can create a to be shared by multiple elements, but use the class to specify a different position of the for each element. 藉由定義下列屬性和類別。The following properties are defined by the and classes. 如果其中任何一個屬性上同時設定而，屬性值，從用。If any of these properties are set on both and the , the property value from the is used. - - - - - - 您也可以使用要停用的項目上顯示功能表。You can also use the to display menus on disabled items. ## Examples 下列範例會將指派相同給兩個按鈕和集合， ， ， ，和屬性來設定到不同的位置，為每個按鈕。The following example assigns the same to two buttons and sets the , , , , and properties to set the to different positions for each button. [!code-xaml[ContextMenuService_snip#SharedContextMenu](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContextMenuService_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#sharedcontextmenu)] 下列範例示範如何使用服務來顯示上停用的按鈕。The following example shows how to use the service to display a on a disabled button. 請注意，您將設定父系的內容功能表按鈕的屬性。Notice that you set the property on the button that is the parent of the context menu. [!code-xaml[ContextMenu#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContextMenu/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#3)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 是否有啟用下拉式陰影效果。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the has the drop shadow effect enabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當隨即開啟，值設為值。When the opens, the value is set to the value of . 將此屬性設定為`true`如果有任何作用屬性是`false`。Setting this property to `true` has no effect if the property is `false`. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會將指派相同給兩個按鈕和集合， ， ， ，和屬性來設定到不同的位置，為每個按鈕。The following example assigns the same to two buttons and sets the , , , , and properties to set the to different positions for each button. [!code-xml[ContextMenuService_snip#SharedContextMenu](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContextMenuService_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#sharedcontextmenu)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以放置splittunneling ， ， ， ，和屬性。You can position a by setting the , , , , and properties. 這些屬性的行為相同一樣。These properties behave the same as they do for a . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快顯放置行為](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 是否可以顯示。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the can be shown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性是`false`使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下父控制項時，沒有出現內容功能表。When the property is `false` the context menu does not appear when the user right-clicks the parent control. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定停用操作功能表屬性設定為 false。The following example shows how to disable a context menu by setting the property to false. [!code-xml[ContextMenuService_snip#ContextMenuServiceIsEnabled](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContextMenuService_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#contextmenuserviceisenabled)]
